text: Hagi zamagra kentahi vahe tro hu'za kagritega ne-eza, Nagri vahekna hu'za kavuga emani'za kema hanankea nentahizanagi, ana nanekea ovaririgahaze. Na'ankure zamagraguke'ma antahizamo zamagu'afina avite'neankiza, vahe'ma zamazeri savri'ma hu'za zagoma eri'za feno vahe'ma mani'zankuke nentahize.
